meanings.definition: The quality of being definite or clearly defined.
meanings.sent1: Her determinatenesses in her decisions always impressed her friends.
meanings.sent2: The determinatenesses of the rules made it easy to follow.
meanings.sent3: The determinatenesses of the schedule left no room for confusion.
meanings.sent4: His determinatenesses in his beliefs were unwavering.
meanings.sent5: The determinatenesses of the map helped them find their way easily.

meanings.definition: The state of being determined or resolved.
meanings.sent1: Their determinatenesses to succeed motivated them to work hard.
meanings.sent2: The determinatenesses of the team members ensured they reached their goal.
meanings.sent3: Despite the storm, their determinatenesses to finish the race remained strong.
meanings.sent4: Her determinatenesses to overcome challenges inspired others.
meanings.sent5: The determinatenesses of the leader guided the team through tough times.
